mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK_MEMBER (MEMBER_SEQ, ID, PASSWORD, NAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, AUTH, BANFLAG, DECLARE_COUNT, MEMBER_DELFLAG) VALUES (BM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, 'U', 'N', 0, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_SEQ, ID, PASSWORD, NAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, AUTH, BANFLAG, DECLARE_COUNT, MEMBER_DELFLAG FROM BOOK_MEMBER bm WHERE ID = #{id} AND PASSWORD = #{password} AND MEMBER_DELFLAG = 'N'
